Author: bleepbloophumanoid
Text: I don’t think you should become vegan just because you want to restrict some food items. That sounds like you’re holding onto disordered behavior. If you want to recover, you have to be ready to give up your disordered behavior.   That said, there are many non-disordered reasons to go vegan (animal welfare concerns, environmental concerns). I think you should avoid exploring veganism though until after you’ve been in recovery for some time. Good luck!
